Use Case: should be able to manage user accounts within the system
Description: The UC describes the functionality that allows microsoft to manage user accounts within the system.

Use Case: should be able to submit requests for technical support through the systems support portal.
Description: The UC describes the functionality that allows microsoft corporation to submit requests for technical support through the systems support portal.

Use Case: should be able to update patient records after consultations.
Description:
The UC describes the functionality that allows 
Amazon Logistics staff to update patient records after consultations.

Use Case: should have the ability to track shipment statuses for all deliveries in real time.
Description: The UC describes the functionality that allows Amazon Logistics staff to track shipment statuses for all deliveries in real time.

Use Case: should be able to upload course materials for students to access online.
Description: The UC describes the functionality that allows Harvard University professors to upload course materials for students to access online.

Use Case: must be able to modify their personal information in the internal HR portal.
Description: The UC describes the functionality that allows Google employees to modify their personal information in the internal HR portal.

Use Case: should be able to assign tasks to team members within the project management system.
Description: The UC describes the functionality that allows Harvard University to assign tasks to team members within the project management system.
